content: Ah interesting. And yes, just remove it if on beta/stable if it's an issue. I only need it on nightly. :3
@GuillaumeGomez do we really need to fetch the whole upstream repo though?

if you just need the previous merge commit https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/8b50cc9a2c408caef30a1cf950c948509b2f648e/src/ci/github-actions/ci.yml#L101-L104 should already be fetching it, otherwise try adding more depth there

So, I need to list the deleted files by the PR in order to check if the error code ones are removed (which should never be allowed!). To do so I needed the master branch with the commit before the PR.
If you have a better way to check it, go for it! :)
This topic was moved here from #t-release > 1.54 release by Pietro Albini
@GuillaumeGomez the code needs to be fixed to work on all branches, otherwise it'll have to be reverted on master too
(we don't want to have commits we need to cherry-pick all cycles to beta)
I need the information before the PR commits
if I can get it without fetching, then so be it
@Pietro Albini Do you mind if we check that in a week or so? Super busy currently with other stuff. I'll put a reminder in my calendar
I'll be on vacation in a week, but sure
well it's fine as long as it's in before next release I guess.
